types:type.name: getEvents
types:type.types:shape:
#%RAML 1.0 DataType
type: object
properties: id?: number title: string description: string lat?: number lng?: number startDate: string endDate: string hidden: boolean status: type: object properties: id: number name: string category: type: object properties: id: number name: string user: type: object properties: id?: number name: string lastName: string avatarUrl: string
images?: type: array items: type: object
properties: id: number alt: string src: string order: number event_id: number

types:type.name: User
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type User = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, lastName: String, email: String, avatarUrl: String |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":114,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Patricio\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Chazarreta\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"chazarreta.patricio@gmail.com\\\",\\\"avatarUrl\\\":\\\"http:\\/\\/test.com\\/img\\/123123.png\\\"}"}
